class_notes:
(Same as QTM 329 1, LING 329 1)
Cross listed with QTM 329 and Ling 329. QTM/Ling 329 cannot count toward the CS major unless students complete both majors.
course_description: This course will focus on the analysis of syntactic and semantic structures, ontologies and taxonomies, distributional semantics and discourse, as well as their applications in computational linguistics. Assignments will include advanced programming implementations.
prerequisites: This course requires CS 171 or  CS 171Z or CS_OX 171 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
schedule_location: TTh 1pm-2:15pm in Math & Science Center - E208
sections: Class Nbr: 2671, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: J. Choi, Status: Open
